item.description:
May Entrepreneurs Forum:
Monetizing Mobile Opportunities

What are the opportunities beyond the App Store?

Thursday, May 13 - 6:30PM at WorkBar Boston

Register for ULS Boston - Monetizing Mobile Opportunities in Boston, MA on Eventbrite - http://ulsbostonmay13...

If you would like to give a 1 minute pitch about your startup please register with a Pitch Ticket. Must be Founder / CEO / or have equity stake in the venture.

Topics:

* Are mobile users willing to pay for services or does free reign supreme?
* Mobile marketing sounds cool ... but does it really work?
* The great divide: Do users of regular mobile devices still matter or just people with smartphones?
* Location, Location, Location! Are these the three most important words in the tech world today?
* Mobile analytics: How do you know if your plan is working?

Moderator:

* Lee Wright - People | Design | Technology

Panelists (alphabetic order):

* Raj Aggarwal - Localtyics
* Josh Bob - Founder, CEO textaurant
* Jason Jacob - Founder, CEO FitnessKeeper
* William Sulinski - CEO AccelGolf
item.name: ULS Boston Forum - Monetizing Mobile Opportunities
